participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Shy and introverted, Alex often finds comfort in her hobbies and dreams of a quiet life. She is kind-hearted but avoids situations that make her uncomfortable.
participant_1.background: i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home. i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and cheerful, Jessica loves spending time with friends and is always excited to share her interests. She has a nurturing side that shines through in her work as a teacher.
participant_2.background: my favorite singer is taylor swift. i'm getting married in the spring. i am 24 years old. i love eating out with friends. i work at a school as a kindergarten teacher.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing?
I am well, just playing some video games.
Are you a fan of video games?
Yes, I love video games.
I see. Which is your favourite?
I like all kinds of video games.
Oh, good. So which one are you playing right now?
I'm playing with my pet iguana.
Wow, you have an iguana. Does it like video games too?
Yeah, he loves to play on my computer.
Cool. Such a smart guy. What's his name?
His name is Leroy Jenkins. He is very smart.
How old is he?
He is ten. He listens to me playing my video games.
Ten! I didn't know iguanas can live that long
I think it has been a few years. How far off are you from the ocean?
Very far :-)
I am not sure, but I think it might be a bit late.
A bit late for what?
Do you have any other pets?
No, i used to have a cat, but no pets at the moment.
That is too bad. I hope you find a new one soon. What about you?
Well, not much. I'm a teacher at a kindergarten, and i'm gonna get married soon.
Congratulations! I hope you get married soon.
Yes, i hope so too :-) What about you? Do you have a girlfriend? Or a boyfriend?
No, I am single. How about you? üôÅ
As i've just said, i have a fiancee.
